mapper.select: SELECT A.TENANT_ID , A.AUTH_KEY , A.AUTH_TYPE , A.AUTH_KEY_TYPE_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM TB_CM_CD WHERE CD_ID = AUTH_KEY_TYPE_CD) AS AUTH_KEY_TYPE_NM , A.ISSU_DT , A.EXPR_DT , A.STATUS_CD , A.SECRET , (CASE WHEN SYSDATE BETWEEN A.ISSU_DT AND A.EXPR_DT THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS USABLE_DATE_YN FROM TB_FW_AUTH_KEY A WHERE 1=1 AND A.AUTH_KEY = #{authKey}
